text: The Suceava () is a river in the northeastern part of Romania (Suceava County) and western part of Ukraine (Chernivtsi Oblast). It is a right tributary of the river Siret. The Suceava is long. The river starts in the Obcina Mestecăniș Mountains, near the border with Ukraine. It ends at the Siret River near the town of Liteni, southeast of the city of Suceava. Category:Rivers of Romania Category:Rivers of Ukraine Category:Suceava County Category:Chernivtsi Oblast
title: Suceava (river)
